description.narrative: The purpose of the Africa Union Support Programme is to help stimulate effective reform within the Africa Union. This will include encouraging and supporting reformers and advising on reform processes, including planning and management of implementation. The programme will not provide any significant assistance with the direct implementation of reforms. Such assistance should be provided through other means, including the Institutional Transformation Programme (ITP).The purpose of the Africa Union Support Programme is to help stimulate effective reform within the Africa Union. This will include encouraging and supporting reformers and advising on reform processes, including planning and management of implementation. The programme will not provide any significant assistance with the direct implementation of reforms. Such assistance should be provided through other means, including the Institutional Transformation Programme (ITP).
